Interviewed with POI by phone in November. I was invited for the visit which was cancelled, and was not invited for the rescheduled visit. From a lesser known university with no publications. Participated in REU at ND and currently conduct research at my university in computer vision and machine learning. Extremely excited, best of luck to all.

To the poster below: I received an invitation to the rescheduled campus visit after my follow-up interview with my POI. When he told me he would recommend me for admission to the committee, he said he would also ask them to put my name on the list for the visit. I don't know if that means the rescheduled visit is more exclusive than the original visit or not. Since I've been accepted, I don't think they'll be interviewing me during the visit, but I plan to meet and talk with my POI.

To the Notre Dame posters: may I ask whether you received any notification regarding the campus visit in March? I attended the online interview and then got an invitation to the campus visit, but nothing about the decision was mentioned. Nor did it say the visit is another round "interview". So I was wondering what to expect.
Attended their online interview in February. From a no name liberal arts program and have no publications. Very surprised and excited. Wish the rest of you success in your admission!

Interested in machine learning and computer vision. BS in math and BS in computer science. Currently in a Masters program in math. Undergrad REU in commutative algebra. Interviewed in Feb and had a follow up interview with POI that I think went well.

To the poster asking about the visit day. Yes I am currently in the US and I am not sure whether the visit invitation is sent only to those who are now in the US. The email is "Our visit "redo" will take place March 7th - 9th. You will travel and arrive March 7th. On March 8th you will have several activities throughout the day which will include visiting labs to meet with graduate students and faculty. You will depart on March 9th. Please complete the form to let me know if you would like to try again to get to campus. " Actually if you check UND on gradcafe, they have sent the invitations in December (I received mine in December). It was set to Jan 31st and Feb 1st at first. However, due to the extreme whether in Midwest, they changed it into an online webinar&interview on Jan 31st and yesterday I was informed invited to the rescheduled visit day in March.

To the post below mentioning campus visit day. Are you in US currently, if not, then does that mean some international students also have been invited for the Visit Day. Also, can you please share the anonymized version of the email you received.

Invited to the rescheduled visiting day from Mar 7th-9th after the webinar and multiple interviews on Jan 31st. Nothing regarding decision was mentioned.  Just kind of confused whether this is another round of on-site interview or it implies acceptance. If it is another round of interview, the decisions may come out by the end of March, which is later than previous years...
POI sent an email to schedule an interview. At the end of the interview, he said he will talk to the committee.
